title: Bitcoin Firm Twenty One Falls 20% After Cantor Equity Merger
description: Shares of Twenty One Capital Inc. declined 20% in its trading debut Tuesday, after it merged with special-purpose acquisition company Cantor Equity Partners Inc. to become the latest public crypto company.
content: Shares of Twenty One Capital Inc. declined 20% in its trading debut Tuesday, after it merged with special-purpose acquisition company Cantor Equity Partners Inc. to become the latest public crypto company.
